author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Comforia Residential Reit to issue 1,110 units to Mizuho Securities
text:
Feb 9 (Reuters) - Comforia Residential Reit Inc
* Says it confirmed that it will issue 1,110 units, with the paid-in price of 225,600 yen per unit, or for 250.4 million yen in total, through private placement to Mizuho Securities Co., Ltd.
* Says subscription date on Feb. 14 and payment date on Feb. 15
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/vkgfmA
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
